TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit UmAlQuraCalendar extends System.Globalization.Calendar

summary.span: 表示沙特阿拉伯 (Um Al Qura) 回历。

span.span: Represents the Saudi Hijri (Um Al Qura) calendar.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类是几乎等同于类中，Um Al Qura 日历使用许可沙特政府的基于表的算法来计算日期，可以只 express 到 1500 年纪元，日期和不支持属性。The class is nearly identical to the class, except the Um Al Qura calendar uses a table-based algorithm licensed from the Saudi government to calculate dates, can express dates to the year 1500 A.H., and does not support the property. > [!NOTE] > 有关使用信息类和其他日历.NET Framework 中的类，请参阅[使用日历](~/docs/standard/datetime/working-with-calendars.md)。For information about using the class and the other calendar classes in the .NET Framework, see [Working with Calendars](~/docs/standard/datetime/working-with-calendars.md). 有关类，每个月有 29 或 30 天，但通常在没有明显的命令。For the class, each month has either 29 or 30 days, but usually in no discernible order. 在伊斯兰日历的文档提供了对应的天显示每个月中的表，而没有此类常规表可以生成为 Um Al Qura 日历。Whereas the documentation for the Hijri Calendar gives a table that shows the corresponding days in each month, no such general table can be produced for the Um Al Qura calendar. 有关在伊斯兰日历的详细信息，请参阅类。For more information about the Hijri calendar, see the class. **请注意**类仅支持从 04/30/1900 00.00.00 （公历日期） 到 11/16/2077年 23:59:59 （公历日期）。**Note** The class supports only dates from 04/30/1900 00.00.00 (Gregorian date) through 11/16/2077 23:59:59 (Gregorian date).

span.span: Working with Calendars

related.span: 示例： 日历周范围实用工具

span.span: Sample: Calendar Week Range Utility

MemberSignature.Value: public override DateTime AddMonths (DateTime time, int months);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance valuetype System.DateTime AddMonths(valuetype System.DateTime time, int32 months) cil managed
Public Overrides Function AddMonths (time As DateTime, months As Integer) As DateTime
public: override DateTime AddMonths(DateTime time, int months);
override this.AddMonths : DateTime * int -> DateTime

span.span: The date to which to add months.
The class supports only dates from 04/30/1900 00.00.00 (Gregorian date) through 11/16/2077 23:59:59 (Gregorian date).

param.name: months
param.span: 要添加的正月数或负月数。

span.span: The positive or negative number of months to add.

summary.span: 计算与指定初始日期相距指定月数的日期。

span.span: Calculates a date that is a specified number of months away from a specified initial date.

returns.span: 在将 参数指定的月数加到 参数指定的日期后所得的日期。

span.span: The date yielded by adding the number of months specified by the parameter to the date specified by the parameter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 所产生的日部分如果结果的日期不是结果生成的年的月份中的有效日期影响。The day part of the resulting is affected if the resulting day is not a valid day in the resulting month of the resulting year. 它已更改为生成的年在生成每月最后一个有效的日期。It is changed to the last valid day in the resulting month of the resulting year. 所生成的年份部分受影响，如果结果的月份之外的指定年份。The year part of the resulting is affected if the resulting month is outside the year of the specified . 此实现支持仅为当前纪元。This implementation supports only the current era. 因此，如果生成的年之外的纪元的指定引发异常。Therefore, an exception is thrown if the resulting year is outside the era of the specified . 所生成的时间的日部分保持不变，与指定。The time-of-day part of the resulting remains the same as the specified . 例如，如果指定的月份是 Zulkadah，包含 30 天，指定的日期是该月的第 30 天和的值`months`参数是 3，生成的年是一个多个指定的年份，生成的月份是 Safar，并生成 d在为 29 日，即 Safar 中的最后一天。For example, if the specified month is Zulkadah, which has 30 days, the specified day is the 30th day of that month, and the value of the `months` parameter is 3, the resulting year is one more than the specified year, the resulting month is Safar, and the resulting day is the 29th day, which is the last day in Safar. 如果的值`months`参数为负，从而早于指定。If the value of the `months` parameter is negative, the resulting is earlier than the specified . 所返回的属性值始终等于。The property of the returned value always equals . 可以保留的属性`time`参数通过调用方法，如以下示例所示。You can preserve the property of the `time` parameter by calling the method, as the following example shows. [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.Calendar.AddMethods#5](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.calendar.addmethods/cs/add1.cs#5)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.Calendar.AddMethods#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.calendar.addmethods/vb/add1.vb#5)] ## Examples 下面的示例实例化值并显示 Um Al Qura 日历中的多个及其组件的值。The following example instantiates a value and displays the values of several of its components in the Um Al Qura calendar. 接下来，调用和Um Al Qura 日历中的 2 年 10 月添加为日期值的方法。Next, it calls the and methods to add 2 years and 10 months in the Um Al Qura calendar to the date value. 最后，它再次显示这些日期组件的值 Um Al Qura 日历中。Finally, it again displays the values of these date components in the Um Al Qura calendar. [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.UmAlQuraCalendar.AddMonths#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.umalquracalendar.addmonths/cs/addmonths1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.UmAlQuraCalendar.AddMonths#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.umalquracalendar.addmonths/vb/addmonths1.vb#1)]

is less than -120,000 or greater than 120,000.

span.span: The date to which to add years.
The class supports only dates from 04/30/1900 00.00.00 (Gregorian date) through 11/16/2077 23:59:59 (Gregorian date).

param.name: years
param.span: 要添加的正年数或负年数。

span.span: The positive or negative number of years to add.

summary.span: 计算与指定初始日期相距指定年数的日期。

span.span: Calculates a date that is a specified number of years away from a specified initial date.

returns.span: 在将 参数指定的年数加到 参数指定的日期后所得的日期。

span.span: The date yielded by adding the number of years specified by the parameter to the date specified by the parameter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 所产生的日部分如果结果的日期不是结果生成的年的月份中的有效日期影响。The day part of the resulting is affected if the resulting day is not a valid day in the resulting month of the resulting year. 它已更改为生成的年在生成每月最后一个有效的日期。It is changed to the last valid day in the resulting month of the resulting year. 所生成的月份部分保持不变，与指定。The month part of the resulting remains the same as the specified . 此实现支持仅为当前纪元。This implementation supports only the current era. 因此，如果生成的年之外的纪元的指定引发异常。Therefore, an exception is thrown if the resulting year is outside the era of the specified . 所生成的时间的日部分保持不变，与指定。The time-of-day part of the resulting remains the same as the specified . 例如，闰年有 29 天，但在闰年时它有 30 天。For example, Zulhijjah has 29 days, except during leap years when it has 30 days. 如果指定的日期是闰年中为闰年的 30 天和的值`years`参数是 1，则得到的日期是闰年 29 日在下一年中的。If the specified date is the 30th day of Zulhijjah in a leap year and the value of the `years` parameter is 1, the resulting date is the 29th day of Zulhijjah in the following year. 如果`years`为负，从而早于指定。If `years` is negative, the resulting is earlier than the specified . 所返回的属性值始终等于。The property of the returned value always equals . 可以保留的属性`time`参数通过调用方法，如以下示例所示。You can preserve the property of the `time` parameter by calling the method, as the following example shows. [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.Calendar.AddMethods#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.calendar.addmethods/cs/add1.cs#8)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.Calendar.AddMethods#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.calendar.addmethods/vb/add1.vb#8)] ## Examples 下面的示例实例化值并显示 Um AL Qura 日历中的多个及其组件的值。The following example instantiates a value and displays the values of several of its components in the Um AL Qura calendar. 接下来，调用和Um Al Qura 日历中的 2 年 10 月添加为日期值的方法。Next, it calls the and methods to add 2 years and 10 months in the Um Al Qura calendar to the date value. 最后，它再次显示这些日期组件的值 Um Al Qura 日历中。Finally, it again displays the values of these date components in the Um Al Qura calendar. [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.UmAlQuraCalendar.AddMonths#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.umalquracalendar.addmonths/cs/addmonths1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.UmAlQuraCalendar.AddMonths#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.umalquracalendar.addmonths/vb/addmonths1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在伊斯兰日历识别一个纪元： 纪元The Hijri calendar recognizes one era: A.H. (拉丁文"Anno Hegirae"，这意味着"year 的迁移后，"迁移的 Muhammad (PBUH) 从麦加迁引用)。(Latin "Anno Hegirae", which means "the year of the migration," in reference to the migration of Muhammad (PBUH) from Mecca). 此属性始终返回具有只有一个元素的数组。This property always returns an array with only one element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值如下所示：The values are as follows: |DayOfWeek 值DayOfWeek value|指示which indicates| |---------------------|---------------------| |星期日Sunday|الاحد (Al Ahad)الاحد (Al-Ahad)| |星期一Monday|الاثنين (Al Ithnayn)الاثنين (Al-Ithnayn)| |星期二Tuesday|الثلاثاء (在 Thulaathaa)الثلاثاء (At-Thulaathaa')| |星期三Wednesday|الاربعاء (Al Arbi'aa)الاربعاء (Al-Arbi'aa')| |星期四Thursday|الخميس (Al Khamiis)الخميس (Al-Khamiis)| |星期五Friday|الجمعة (Al Jumu'ah)الجمعة (Al-Jumu'ah)| |星期六Saturday|السبت (作为 Sabt)السبت (As-Sabt)| ## Examples 下面的示例显示的多个组件的值方面 Um Al Qura 日历。The following example displays the values of several components of a in terms of the Um Al Qura calendar. [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.UmAlQuraCalendar.AddMonths#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.umalquracalendar.addmonths/cs/addmonths1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.UmAlQuraCalendar.AddMonths#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.umalquracalendar.addmonths/vb/addmonths1.vb#1)]

span.span: An integer from 1 through 355 that represents the day of the year specified by the parameter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一年中的一天被指从一年的第一天的天数。The day of the year is defined as the number of days from the first day of the year. 例如，方法返回 1 年和上个月的最后一天的年份的天数总数的第一个月的第一天。For example, the method returns 1 for the first day of the first month of the year, and the total number of days in the year for the last day of the last month. ## Examples 下面的示例显示的多个组件的值方面 Um Al Qura 日历。The following example displays the values of several components of a in terms of the Um Al Qura calendar. [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.UmALQuraCalendar.AddMonths#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.umalquracalendar.addmonths/cs/addmonths1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.UmALQuraCalendar.AddMonths#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.umalquracalendar.addmonths/vb/addmonths1.vb#1)]

span.span: A year.

An era.

summary.span: 计算指定纪元年份的指定月份中的天数。

span.span: Calculates the number of days in the specified month of the specified year and era.

returns.span: 指定纪元年份中指定月份的天数。

span.span: The number of days in the specified month in the specified year and era.

returns.span: 返回值是 29（在平年中）或 30（在闰年中）。

span.span: The return value is 29 in a common year and 30 in a leap year.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法返回不同天数在平年和闰年指定月份中。This method returns a different number of days in a specified month for a common year versus a leap year. 例如，此方法为闰年返回 29 或 30 (`month` = 12)，具体取决于`year`是否为闰年。For example, this method returns 29 or 30 for Zulhijjah (`month` = 12), depending on whether `year` is a leap year. ## Examples 下面的示例调用方法以获取每个月内连续五年的天数。The following example calls the method to get the number of days in each month of five consecutive years. [!code-csharp[System.Globalization.UmAlQuraCalendar.GetDaysInMonth#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.umalquracalendar.getdaysinmonth/cs/getdaysinmonth1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Globalization.UmAlQuraCalendar.GetDaysInMonth#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.globalization.umalquracalendar.getdaysinmonth/vb/getdaysinmonth1.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在日历中支持闰月的概念，特定月后或在一年中的任何月份之后发生的闰月。In a calendar that supports the notion of a leap month, the leap month can occur either after a particular month or after any month in a year. 例如，方法返回一个数字，介于 1 到 13，该值指示指定日期与关联的月份之间。For example, the method returns a number between 1 and 13 that indicates the month associated with a specified date. 如果，在一年的第八个和第九个月之间存在闰月方法的第八个月内，闰第 8 个月的 9 和 10 中的第九个月返回 8。If there is a leap month between the eighth and ninth months of the year, the method returns 8 for the eighth month, 9 for the leap eighth month, and 10 for the ninth month.

span.span: is less than 1318 or greater than 1450.

MemberSignature.Value: public override int ToFourDigitYear (int year);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance int32 ToFourDigitYear(int32 year) cil managed
Public Overrides Function ToFourDigitYear (year As Integer) As Integer
public: override int ToFourDigitYear(int year);
override this.ToFourDigitYear : int -> int

param.name: year
param.span: 一个从 0 到 99 的两位数年份，或一个从 1318 到 1450 的四位数 Um Al Qura 日历年份。

span.span: A 2-digit year from 0 through 99, or a 4-digit Um Al Qura calendar year from 1318 through 1450.

summary.span: 使用 属性将指定的年份转换为四位数年份，以确定相应的纪元。

span.span: Converts the specified year to a four-digit year by using the property to determine the appropriate century.

returns.span: 如果 参数是两位数年份，则返回值是对应的四位数年份。

span.span: If the parameter is a 2-digit year, the return value is the corresponding 4-digit year.

returns.span: 如果 参数是四位数年份，则返回值是未更改的 参数。

span.span: If the parameter is a 4-digit year, the return value is the unchanged parameter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法使用`year`参数，属性和一年来计算的 4 位数年份。The method uses the `year` parameter, the property, and a year to calculate a 4-digit year. 通过查找 2 位数字的唯一匹配项来确定在世纪`year`该 100 年范围内的参数。The century is determined by finding the sole occurrence of the 2-digit `year` parameter within that 100-year range. 例如，如果设置为 1429，100 年范围是从 1330 至 1429年。For example, if is set to 1429, the 100-year range is from 1330 through 1429. 因此，为 30 的 2 位值被解释为 1330，而 29 一个 2 位值被解释为 1429年。Therefore, a 2-digit value of 30 is interpreted as 1330, while a 2-digit value of 29 is interpreted as 1429. 如果属性是特殊值 99方法将忽略区域中的设置和语言选项控制面板中，并返回`year`参数保持不变。If the property is the special value 99, the method ignores the settings in the regional and language options in Control Panel and returns the `year` parameter unchanged. 支持两位数年份或四位数年份。 supports either a two-digit year or a four-digit year. 传递一个两位数的年份值 (小于 100) 导致该方法将值转换为四位数字值根据值，该值表示相应的纪元。Passing a two-digit year value (less than 100) causes the method to convert the value to a four-digit value according to the value representing the appropriate century. 如果应用程序提供对在支持的日历范围内的四位数年份值，该方法返回的实际输入的值。If the application supplies a four-digit year value that is within the supported calendar range to , the method returns the actual input value. 如果应用程序提供支持的日历范围之外的四位数字值或提供一个负值，则该方法将引发异常。If the application supplies a four-digit value that is outside the supported calendar range, or if it supplies a negative value, the method throws an exception.

exception.span: 超出了此日历支持的范围。

span.span: is outside the range supported by this calendar.

summary.span: 获取或设置可以用两位数年份表示的 100 年范围内的最后一年。

span.span: Gets or sets the last year of a 100-year range that can be represented by a 2-digit year.

value.span: 可以用两位数年份表示的 100 年范围内的最后一年。

span.span: The last year of a 100-year range that can be represented by a 2-digit year.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性允许两位数年份，以正确转换为四位数年份。This property allows a 2-digit year to be properly translated to a 4-digit year. 例如，如果此属性设置为 1429年，100 年范围是从 1330 至 1429年。For example, if this property is set to 1429, the 100-year range is from 1330 through 1429. 因此，为 30 的 2 位值被解释为 1330，而 29 一个 2 位值被解释为 1429年。Therefore, a 2-digit value of 30 is interpreted as 1330, while a 2-digit value of 29 is interpreted as 1429. 此属性的初始值被派生自控制面板的区域和语言选项部分中的设置。The initial value of this property is derived from the settings in the regional and language options portion of Control Panel. 但是，该信息可以更改的生命周期内。However, that information can change during the life of the . 类不检测系统设置中的更改自动。The class does not detect changes in the system settings automatically. 这两个特殊值 99 使方法忽略系统设置，并返回指定的年份保持不变。The special value 99 causes the method to ignore the system settings and return the specified year unchanged.

exception.span: 此日历为只读。

span.span: This calendar is read-only.

exception.span: 在设置操作中，Um Al Qura 年份值小于 1318 而不是 99，或者大于 1450。

span.span: In a set operation, the Um Al Qura calendar year value is less than 1318 but not 99, or is greater than 1450.

val mutable UmAlQuraEra : int

summary.span: 表示当前纪元。

span.span: Represents the current era.

summary.span: 此字段为常数。

span.span: This field is constant.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值字段为 1。The value of the field is 1. Um Al Qura 日历识别一个纪元： 纪元The Um Al Qura calendar recognizes one era: A.H. (拉丁文"Anno Hegirae"，这意味着"year 的迁移后，"迁移的 Muhammad (PBUH) 从麦加迁引用)。(Latin "Anno Hegirae", which means "the year of the migration," in reference to the migration of Muhammad (PBUH) from Mecca).
